articles.title: Market flat amid weak Asian cues; positive bias intact as long as Nifty stays above 22,200 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Profit-booking normal in a bullish market and there is no negative reversal for now, says Prashant Sawant of Catalyst Wealth
articles.content:
Equity benchmarks were flat-to-negative on March 11 morning amid weak Asian cues. Analysts, however, believe that the positive bias will be in intact as long as the Nifty holds above 22,200.
